metadata.synopsis: This AD plays upon attacking the intellect devourer Us inside the Colony.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe morgue_us" and "oe COL_Butcher", in either order- Walk over to the cage that Us is in- Use command "oe morgue_cagesneak": Chop will be blinded and Us' cage will be unlocked- While Chop is blinded, attack Us.

0.speaker: Us
0.text: No, friend - do not harm Us! Please!
